General.Name: Landis Taipei Hotel Co Ltd
General.Description: The Landis Taipei Hotel Co., Ltd engages in tourist hotel business in Taiwan. The company operates The Landis Taipei Hotel, which offers superior and deluxe rooms, executive and corner suites, dining and meeting rooms, banquet halls, and wedding and travel packages, as well as fitness center, business center, and lounge facilities. It also engages in restaurant, cafe, and bar businesses. The Landis Taipei Hotel Co., Ltd was founded in 1977 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.
